channel.title: life on Justin Napolitano
channel.description: Recent content in life on Justin Napolitano

item.title: Running
item.description: Running I like to run… or maybe I like to jog. It doesn’t really matter. I like move a little faster than walking. My Goals When I run I just move. I don’t really think about what my goals are. I guess I try to be fast. I think this is wrong. What would I rather focus on? Breathing Avoiding injury Remaining balanced Adapting to the terrain Breathing I hold my breath when I run.
